Articles.Content:
My game keeps on crashing every time it's in the loading files part!!!!!!!!!!!

can someone pls help me!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The Link for the files are listed below

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/qt6p917sw9zgsql/AABZLrbk4jxhXTQnYgPXy-M6a?dl=0

error.log : 

Error occurred at 2017-07-28_225008.
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by Denniz.
72% memory in use.
0 MB physical memory [2752 MB free].
0 MB paging file [0 MB free].
0 MB user address space [95 MB free].
Write to location 00000000 caused an access violation.

Surprise, surprise. You're running out of memory. How predictable.

output.log also reports 'out of memory' on various locations.

There is a reason I made it the VERY FIRST item in the FAQ.

 

Edited July 28, 2017 by Tex_NL

Yep you are running out of memory because the 32bit version of the game has a hardcoded (as in mathematically impossible to increase) limit of 4GB of allocated RAM. You quickly get to that limit with a few graphic mods.

The solution to fix this is to use the 64bit version of the game, for instructions on how to do it, please read the post I linked below, it's an answer to the same issue.
